table.name: vtiger_leadsourcemanager
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_leadsourcemanager` ( `leadsourcemanagerid` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `source_name` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `agency_code` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `vanlinemanager_id` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `brand` varchar(10) DEFAULT NULL, `lmp_program_id` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `lmp_source_id` int(19) DEFAULT NULL, `marketing_channel` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `program_name` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `program_terms` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL, `source_type` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `active` tinyint(1) DEFAULT NULL ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_leadsourcemanagercf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_leadsourcemanagercf` ( `leadsourcemanagerid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`leadsourcemanagerid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
